snippet.title: kongregate web game 공 물리학 헝그리 블랙홀 (Ball physics : Hungry Black Hole)
snippet.description:
#MobileGame #SmartPhoneGame #PuzzleGame #MadeWithUnity
[Kongregate] https://www.kongregate.com/games/SEArts/ball-physics-hungry-black-hole

itch.io - for desktop(Windows / MacOSX) : https://selfexpressionarts.itch.io/ball-physics-hungry-black-hole

"Hungry Black Hole" is a mobile game for iOS and Android
You download "Hungry Black Hole" for free

Android : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.searts.HungryBlackHole
iOS : https://itunes.apple.com/kr/app/hungry-black-hole/id1200323370

극히 쉬운 조작, 그러나 여러가지 기발한 방법을 떠올려서 레벨을 클리어 하셔야 트리플메달을 받으실 수 있습니다.

The game’s highlights:
• It can be played so easily with one hand• More creative idea to solve the level leads to triple medal• Various specific bombs make more creative combination to solve the level creatively
• Players can show off by uploading and sharing their play video
• Physics based  platformer game / Brain Challenging / Physics puzzles
